I have a command 'search container' and I want to list the contents of that container, but I do not want the children listed when I look at the container.

How can I list the contents of a container without 'look at container'?  Is there a simple text processor command or code script I can use or a GUI option?  Any will do.

Thanks.

Posts.EditableText: I think you want the FormatObjectList function. Use the container as the parent. http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/ ... tlist.html I have a feeling the final Boolean is no longer used, and the documentation has yet to be updated, so if you get an error, try it without that.
